productBanner.heading: Aadhaar Masking API
productBanner.tagline: Automate Aadhaar Data Masking for Regulatory Compliance

inlineImageAndParagraph.text: The Decentro Aadhaar Masking API, a core component of the Farsight Document Forensics suite, offers an intelligent, automated solution for redacting the first 8 digits of an Aadhaar number from uploaded images. This ensures strict adherence to UIDAI and other data privacy regulations, streamlining KYC processes while safeguarding sensitive customer information.

items.description: Securely upload Aadhaar card images (front or back). Our API intelligently detects the Aadhaar number's location and structure on the document for precise processing.
Utilize advanced image processing and OCR to automatically identify and mask the first 8 digits of the Aadhaar number, rendering them unreadable and compliant.
Receive the processed image with the Aadhaar number securely masked, ready for compliant storage and further processing within your systems.
